name: Senior Citizen Racing
description:
Welcome to Evergreen retirement community

A quiet and tranquil place where senior citizens can live out the end of their days in peace…
But there are those who still have the need… The need for speed!
So they started an underground mobility scooter racing circuit
It is the latest high for elderly adrenaline junkies
Rise to the challenge and leave your opponents in the dust
Your journey to the top starts here!
